attention1.ptxt: To avoid getting burned, do not remove radiator cap while engine and radiator are still hot. Scalding fluid and steam can gush out under pressure if cap is taken off too soon.

s1.ptxt: Fill reservoir (1) with coolant up to “FULL” level mark (3).
Fill radiator with coolant up to bottom of radiator filler neck (1) and install radiator cap.

spec.title: Coolant capacity
spec.ptxt: Engine, radiator and heater (5 M/T model): 6.6 liters (13.95/11.61 US/lmp pt.)
Engine, radiator and heater (4 A/T model): 6.5 liters (13.74/11.44 US/lmp pt.)
Total (5 M/T model): 7.3 liters (15.43/12.85 US/lmp pt.)
Total (4 A/T model): 7.2 liters (15.22/12.67 US/lmp pt.)

s1.ptxt: Run engine until radiator fan motor is operated.
Stop engine and wait until engine comes cooled down to avoid getting burned.
Add coolant to radiator up to bottom of radiator filler neck, and install radiator cap.
Confirm that coolant level in reservoir is at “FULL” level mark. If coolant is insufficient, add coolant.
